metas.name: Kiki's Delivery Service
metas.description: Similar enchanting fantasy and coming-of-age themes as Studio Ghibli films.

metas.name: Howl's Moving Castle
metas.description: Another beautiful Studio Ghibli fantasy with a strong female lead and magical elements.

metas.name: Ponyo on the Cliff by the Sea
metas.description: You already watched Ponyo, but if you loved it, this is a must-see for its charm and magic.

metas.name: Castle in the Sky
metas.description: Classic Studio Ghibli adventure with a sense of wonder and mystery.

metas.name: My Neighbor Totoro
metas.description: You already watched My Neighbor Totoro, but it's a cornerstone of this genre for a reason!

metas.name: Spirited Away
metas.description: You already watched Spirited Away, a masterpiece of fantasy and adventure!

metas.name: The Secret World of Arrietty
metas.description: Delicate and imaginative animated fantasy about tiny people, reminiscent of the charm in Ghibli films.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: Epic adventure with a strong protagonist, great music, and beautiful animation, similar to Tangled and Brave.

metas.name: Frozen
metas.description: Magical adventure with catchy songs and a focus on sisterly love, similar to Tangled and Brave.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Heartwarming adventure with fantastic animation and a unique friendship story, similar to Kung Fu Panda and Brave.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the thrilling adventures and emotional depth of Hiccup and Toothless.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The epic conclusion to the beloved dragon-riding saga.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 2
metas.description: Action-packed and humorous sequel to Kung Fu Panda, with great animation.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 3
metas.description: Continues the journey of Po with themes of family and self-discovery, in the same fun spirit.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: Hilarious and action-packed animated comedy about a quirky family on an adventure, similar to Zootopia.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Groundbreaking animation and exciting adventure with a fresh take on superheroes, appealing to fans of The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Sing
metas.description: You already watched Sing, a fun musical comedy with lovable characters.

metas.name: Sing 2
metas.description: You already watched Sing 2, another delightful musical adventure with great songs.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: Laugh-out-loud family comedy with a fast-paced plot and memorable characters, similar to Kung Fu Panda and Zootopia.

metas.name: Lilo & Stitch
metas.description: A unique blend of sci-fi adventure and heartfelt family story, with a quirky sense of humor.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A charming musical adventure with a strong heroine and a magical twist, similar to Tangled.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: Inspiring and visually stunning animated film about following your dreams, with a unique premise like The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Enchanted
metas.description: A fun blend of animation and live-action, a fairy tale adventure with humor and heart.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: Incredibly creative and funny animated adventure with a positive message, similar to The Bad Guys and Zootopia.

metas.name: The LEGO Batman Movie
metas.description: Hilarious and action-packed spin-off with a unique comedic style, appealing to fans of The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: Charming and heartwarming family comedy about a lovable bear's adventures in London.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Even more delightful and fun than the first, a perfect family adventure.

metas.name: The Little Prince
metas.description: A visually stunning and philosophical animated film with a sense of wonder and adventure.

metas.name: Epic
metas.description: Visually spectacular adventure film with a hidden world and a brave heroine, similar to Brave.

metas.name: Rio
metas.description: Vibrant and musical animated adventure set in Brazil, with a charming cast of characters.

metas.name: Rio 2
metas.description: Continues the colorful musical adventure with new songs and exciting escapades.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A clever and funny animated adventure about delivering Christmas presents, with a unique premise.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: Hilarious stop-motion animated adventure about chickens trying to escape their farm, similar in humor to Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Willoughbys
metas.description: Quirky and darkly comedic animated adventure about four children who try to get rid of their terrible parents.

metas.name: Abominable
metas.description: A heartwarming adventure about a young girl who helps a Yeti get back home.

metas.name: Next Gen
metas.description: Action-packed animated sci-fi adventure with a strong female lead and cool robots.

metas.name: Big Hero 6
metas.description: Action-packed animated adventure with a focus on friendship and technology, with elements of comedy.

metas.name: The Croods
metas.description: Humorous and visually rich prehistoric adventure about a family's journey to find a new home.

metas.name: The Croods: A New Age
metas.description: Continues the funny and adventurous journey of the Crood family with new challenges and characters.
